# iosxr_performance_measurement_interface (Data Source)

This data source can read the Performance Measurement Interface configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_performance_measurement_interface" "example" {
  interface_name = "GigabitEthernet0/0/0/1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interface_name` (String) Enable Performance Measurement on an interface

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `delay_measurement` (Boolean) Enable delay-measurement on the interface
- `delay_measurement_advertise_delay` (Number) Advertisement delay (uSec)
- `delay_measurement_fallback` (Boolean) Configure fallback mode for interfaces when computed delay metric is not available
- `delay_measurement_profile_name` (String) Profile name
- `delay_measurement_static_delay` (Number) Static delay
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `next_hop_ipv4` (String) IPv4 address
- `next_hop_ipv6` (String) IPv6 address
- `path_tracing` (Boolean) Enable path-tracing
- `path_tracing_interface_id` (Number) Config interface ID for path tracing
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st0` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [8:15]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st1` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [12:19]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st2` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [16:23]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st3` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [20:27]
